Title: The Tragedy of Safari – Magic Lasso Adblock
Description: Why one of the world’s most popular web browsers rarely gets the respect it deserves

Title: How IPFS is broken
Description:
I once fell for this talk about “content-addressing”. It sounds very
nice. You know a certain file exists, you know there are probably people
who have it, but you don’t know where or if it is hosted on a domain
somewhere. With content-addressing you can just say “start” and the
download will start.
